title: Color palettes for R Pirates from yarrr package
author: Nathaniel Phillips
description: The piratepal function rom parrr package can return multiple nice color palettes, and once you find a palette you like, you can return the colors as a vector

title: Color palettes from ghibli package
author: Ewen Henderson, Danielle Desrosiers
description: Do you like anime movies from ghibli studio? This ghibli package provides 9 different palettes with a light, medium and dark variant for each

title: Color palettes from jcolors package
author: Jared Huling
description: A selection of ggplot2 color palettes that Jared likes, it contains both discrete and continuous palettes

title: Color palettes from lisa package
author: Tyler Littlefield
description: A color palatte R package that contains 128 palettes from Color Lisa

title: Color palette helper
author: Gregor Aisch
description: Not an R package, but can help you to create your own palette

title: Color palettes from paletteer package
author: Emil Hvitfeldt
description: Tired of trying different packages, try this comprehensive collection of color palettes in R

title: Scientific Journal and Sci-Fi Themed
author: Nan Xiao, Miaozhu Li
description: ggsci offers a collection of high-quality color palettes inspired by colors used in scientific journals, data visualization libraries, science fiction movies, and TV shows.

title: colourpicker
author: Dean Attali
description: A colour picker tool for Shiny and for selecting colours in plots (in R
